Status During Battle
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Battle (Tournaments/Strays): Status During Battle
By GoldenBoy on Thursday, December 5, 2002 - 09:08 pm:

StatusDescription
Confused "???"The monster doesn't know what to do.For a brief period of time, it's rendered defenseless. Confusion often happens when the monster's loyalty to the breeder is low.
PowerThe Monster's attack causes more damage than usual and it can move more quickly. If it's hit with a Guts-depleting attack in this state,though, more guts are lost
FuryThe monster is enraged. The accuracy of its moves increases and its Guts-depleting attacks drain more of the opponent's Guts. However, more Guts are needed to perform skills.
Hyped-UpThe monster's speed of movement and dodging ability increase, but more damage is received than usual.
Hold OnThe monster recovers Guts more quickly and its Defense increases.
RealThe monster's stats rise, and its attack power also increases. However, only certain breeds can enter this state, and it happens only rarely.
GuardThe monster recovers Guts more quickly and the opponent's skills cause less damage. It's own attacks cause less damage, though, too.
PalsyThe monster is paralyzed. Its attack power drops and it can't move as quickly as usual.
Volt ShockThe monster has been electrucuted. Its defensive power drops and it can't move as quickly as usual.
AddledThe monster's thinking is muddled. Its defense power drops and it's difficult to perform skills.
